banner_text: We built the Goldwise platform to make it easy, secure, and efficient for retail investors to trade physical precious metals with Confidence
blog_text: Use market leading technical charts from our partner TradingView to analyse trends and support...
blog_title: Our guide to investing in precious metals
business_button_title: Learn More On Our Business Page
business_card_1_text: We offer two API integration options so you can choose the one that works best for your tech stack
business_card_2_text: Choose the metals, formats and vaults you want to offer to your customers
business_card_3_text: We can offer a large range of currencies and vault locations around the world, 24,7 - to align to your business needs
business_card_4_text: Our technology and security is enterprise grade and PSD2 compliant so we can securely handle large volumes and order throughput with ease
business_head_text: Easily, Securely & Efficiently provide your customers with precious metals.
chris_bio: Chris manages the development and technology teams at Goldwise
gareth_bio: Gareth manages the product, marketing, and customer teams at Goldwise
jatin_bio: Jatin manages the financial, operational and compliance teams at Goldwise
our_purpose_text: “We believe that protecting and growing your savings and wealth will lead to financial freedom and enable you to fulfil your life dreams”
our_vision_text: “To have endabled our customers to achieve financial freedom having protected and grown their savings and wealth with precious metals“
owner_text: Want to join us on our mission to democratise precious metals? We will be looking for investors to help finance our global growth plans. Want to learn more? Signup to our investor newsletter to hear the latest investment opportunities
value_1_text: Everything we do, we do with our customers first in mind
value_2_text: We’re factual, transparent, and honest - always
value_3_text: We always look for new and better ways to deliver access and value to our customers
value_4_text: Our offering is for every type of individual and anyone and everyone can get involved, customers and team members alike
value_5_text: We’re on a mission and we only want passionate and fully committed people in our team
value_6_text: We want our service and operations to be fast and efficient to benefit everyone and to create delight
value_head_text: Our 6 core values that we live by
